languages.text: В запахе амасека ощущаются странные нотки — очень похоже на то, что жидкость отравлена.
There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.
languages.original_text: В запахе амасека ощущаются странные нотки — очень похоже на то, что жидкость отравлена.

traits.locale_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.
There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.
There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.
There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.
There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

languages.text: 这瓶艾玛赛克酒的味道很古怪，很可能是被人下了毒。
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: 这瓶艾玛赛克酒的味道很古怪，很可能是被人下了毒。

languages.text: Este amasec tiene un olor raro... es probable que esté envenenado.
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: Este amasec tiene un olor raro... es probable que esté envenenado.

languages.text: このアマセックは異臭がする―毒が盛られているようだ。
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: このアマセックは異臭がする―毒が盛られているようだ。

languages.text: Dieser Amasec riecht merkwürdig – er wurde sehr wahrscheinlich vergiftet.
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Amasec riecht merkwürdig – er wurde sehr wahrscheinlich vergiftet.

languages.text: Cet amasec dégage une drôle d'odeur. Vous ne seriez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} qu'il soit empoisonné.
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: Cet amasec dégage une drôle d'odeur. Vous ne seriez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} qu'il soit empoisonné.

languages.text: Bu amasekte tuhaf bir koku var. İçine zehir katılmış olması kuvvetle muhtemel.
languages.original_text: There's an odd smell to this amasec — it seems very likely that the drink has been poisoned.

traits.locale_text: Bu amasekin kokusu biraz tuhaf. İçine zehir katılmış olabilir.
